name: Galaxsaur's Journey Through Space
description:
Platform: PC in a web browser

GameGenre: Platformer/endless runner

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview: This game is a 2D endless runner where your objective is to get as high of a score as possible.

Instructions: To move, the left and right arrow keys are usable as well as 'a' and 'd'

To jump press Space

Game Designer: Brandon Parks
